TarzanCore::authenticate ( $  action,
$  opt = null,
$  queue_url = null,
$  message = null 
)

Authenticate

Authenticates a connection to AWS and is used by EC2, SQS, and SimpleDB. This method is not intended to be manually called. Instead it is called by the other functions on a per-use basis.

private

Parameters:
string $action (Required) Indicates the action to perform.
array $opt (Optional) Associative array of parameters for authenticating. See the individual methods for allowed keys.
string $queue_url (Optional) The URL of the queue to perform the action on.
string $message (Optional) This parameter is only used by the send_message() method.
Returns:
object A TarzanHTTPResponse response object.
See also:
http://docs.amazonwebservices.com/AWSSimpleQueueService/2008-01-01/SQSDeveloperGuide/Query_QueryAuth.html

Reimplemented in AmazonS3.
